description: This file defines a SearchFragment class for the Android frontend of a note-taking app. It provides search functionality by querying notes via NoteRepository and displaying results using a RecyclerView with NoteAdapter.

classes.name: SearchFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that provides search functionality over notes. It initializes UI components, handles user input for search queries, interacts with NoteRepository to fetch data, and updates the display accordingly.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout, initializes UI components, and sets up search input listener.

methods.name: doSearch
methods.description: Performs a search on notes based on the query string and updates the RecyclerView with results.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of SearchFragment.
